attributes.action: Consider the concequenses of a 0.5% 09/10 pay rise for Local Gov Workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After seeing MP's getting a rise fo 2.33% for 2009/2010 and also the bizzare and crazy abuse of the expences system in the house of commons it is outrageous that local govement workers will again suffer.

This shows a blatent lack of respect for the people who keep this country going !!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
